thread.title: Why Dell’s EMC Bid Leaves VMware Looking Like Devalued Currency
thread.title_full: Why Dell’s EMC Bid Leaves VMware Looking Like Devalued Currency - WSJ

author: Dan Gallagher
title: Why Dell’s EMC Bid Leaves VMware Looking Like Devalued Currency
text:
VMware will move to new ownership digs if Michael Dell’s plan to purchase EMC goes through. But VMware investors aren’t thrilled by the idea. Perhaps that is because it leaves them in something of a halfway house.
VMware is a major part of Dell’s plan announced Monday to acquire EMC in a deal valued at $67 billion. If completed, it would be the largest tech merger on record and would create a privately held giant with more than $80... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
